Body:
"""Test paragraphs are correctly split with no closing element.""" r = HtmlReader() d = r.parse('

First para

Second Para') self.assertEqual(len(d.elements), 2) self.assertEqual(d.elements[0].text, 'First para') self.assertEqual(d.elements[1].text, 'Second Para') for el in d.elements: self.assertIsInstance(el, Paragraph)
